title.title: Liberating access to historical data for everyone
title.description: Reliable, highly detailed Bitcoin/cryptocurrency historical market data tailored for your need

briefdetail.title: Have you ever felt getting market data and formatting them is tedious and time-consuming?
briefdetail.1: We thought these times are unnecessary if we could share the platform to record/store the historical data and format on need.
briefdetail.2: Storing and formatting Big Data for multiple exchanges is no longer needed. Instead, you can use the time for the real work you need to do.

detail.1: Our API can be easily integrated to your project using opensource libraries. This demo provides a sandbox environment where you can interact with our API using Node.JS platform. Other programming languages such as Python3, Golang are also supported with the similar syntax via our other libraries. You can edit codes and run them to check if it meets your requirements.
detail.2: In this demo, you can lookup any data from any exchanges in any format dating back from UTC 2020-1-1 00:00:00 to 01:00:00.

1.title: Bitmex 'XBTUSD' orderbook
1.comment: A snapshot is included at the beggining of every request to orderbook channel

2.title: Bitflyer 'FX_BTC_JPY' orderbook
2.comment: We support snapshot for lightning_board_snapshot_ channel

3.title: Bitmex 'XBTUSD' trade and Bitflyer 'FX_BTC_JPY' executions
3.comment: Streaming multiple exchanges' channels at once

befree.title: Be Free From Datasets
befree.1: There always is a hidden cost of maintaining datasets such as finding reliable storage, spending human resources in formatting data, ensuring access from multiple environments, e.g.
befree.2: Exchangedataset is an on-demand streaming service, whose high availability is backed by Amazon Web Service, so you can always rely on our infrastructure to take care of storage, formatting and consistency across the environments.

nolimit.1: Why spend extra for access to order book data, or pay annually for access to all data?
nolimit.2: As long as transfer quota* is available, customers are free to access any data we have, which includes trade, orderbook, ticker, and other data recorded from exchanges' public WebSocket in raw and JSON format if it is supported.
nolimit.3: *Snapshot endpoint consumes quota based on scanned bytes rather than transferred bytes. All individual access to endpoints will consume at least 1024 quota.

libraries.title: Libraries Available
libraries.1: Integrating a data providing service to your project could be one of the most tiring part.
libraries.2: We provide the libraries for the most common programming languages, so you can concentrate on your real project, not a boring part of it.

exchanges.title: Supported Exchanges
exchanges.detail: Messages from exchanges' WebSocket are recorded before they are accessed via our API. The exchanges below are fully or partially supported and the list to the right shows which channels are pre-recorded and available.

supported.title: Supported Programming Languages
supported.detail: The library is designed to minimize the differences in syntax between languages. This makes it easy to port projects from one language to another. The libraries are available in the following languages:

fullaccess.name: Full Access To Everyone
fullaccess.detail: Do not pay expensive yearly payment to get full access, you always get the full access to our service.

payfortransfer.name: Pay For Transfer
payfortransfer.detail: Best for individuals and small business owners, flexible for customers running big businesses.

highavailability.name: High Avaiablility
highavailability.detail: Amazon Web Service on which our service is based, helps running our service 24/7.

serversideformatting.name: Server Side Formatting
serversideformatting.detail: Standard formatting is done in server side, reducing client work load.

fastsnapshot.name: Fast Snapshot
fastsnapshot.detail: Some channels needs a initial state. We provide the special endpoint to get a snapshot in ~10sec.

quickdataavailability.name: Quick Data Avaiablility
quickdataavailability.detail: It takes 1-2 minutes for historical data to be available for query.

formatteddata.name: Formatted Data
formatteddata.detail: We provide formatted data for orderbook and trade channels.

rawdata.name: Raw Data
rawdata.detail: We also provide raw WebSocket data native to exchanges including a partial support for a snapshot.

libraries.name: Libraries
libraries.detail: Easily incorporate Exchangedataset to an existing project by utilizing libraries.

pickquota.title: Or, you can choose how much you need
pickquota.detail: Type in how much quota you need in GB. We recommend you to have a little margin.

price.title: How is the price calculated?
price.1: Our price structure is based on quota. The table below shows the prices of quota/GB/month.
price.2: The total price is the summation of the class price times the quota applied to the class.

newcustomer.title: What will I get when I order from this website?
newcustomer.1: You will receive a new API-key via email. API-key comes with a brand-new Ticket with the quota you have ordered.
newcustomer.2: You will also receive an auto-generated password to login to the API-key Management Console, where you can manage your API-keys and purchase new Tickets.

howfast.title: How much time is it take to receive an API-key?
howfast.1: The process usually only requires about a few seconds, but it might take more than 1 minute depending on the processing of the payment.
howfast.2: Upon receipt, you will be able to use the API-key immediately.

faq.more: For general, service related questions, click here.

email.title: Enter Your E-mail Address
email.detail: We will send you a email to this address with a API-key and a password neccesary to login to our API Management Console.

paymentsuccess.title: Thank you!
paymentsuccess.detail: Thank you for purchasing our product! We will send you a email with your auto-generated password after the payment is captured. This process usually only requires about a few seconds, but it might take more than 1 minute(s) depending on the processing of the payment. If you think it is taking too much time, please send an email to the support.
